changeSet.author: astrauss
changeSet.sql: update personnel set PERSONNEL_STATUS_ID = (select PERSONNEL_STATUS_ID from PERSONNEL_STATUS_REF where DESCRIPTION = 'Inactive') where LOGIN_CREDENTIAL in ( 'HLRS01', 'HLRS02', 'HLRS03', 'HLRS04', 'HLRS05', 'HLRS06', 'HLRS07', 'HLRS08', 'HLRS09', 'HLRS10', 'HLRS81', 'HLRS82', 'HLRS83', 'HLRS84', 'HLRS91', 'HLRS92', 'HLRS93', 'HLRS94', 'HLRS95', 'HLRS96', 'HLRS97', 'HLRS98', 'HLRS99', 'HLR100', 'HLR101', 'HLR102', 'HLR103', 'HLR104', 'HLR105', 'HLR106', 'HLR107', 'HLR108', 'HLR109', 'HLR110', 'HLR111', 'HLR112', 'HLR113', 'HLR114', 'HLR115', 'HLR116', 'HLR117', 'HLR118', 'HLR119', 'HLR120', 'HLR121', 'HLR122', 'HLR123', 'HLR124', 'HLR125', 'HLR126', 'HLR127', 'HLR128', 'HLR129', 'HLR130', 'HLR131', 'HLR132', 'HLR133', 'HLR134', 'HLR135', 'HLR136' )
